LOGIN_P_1: Easiest way to manage multiple Instagram and Pinterest accounts.
LOGIN_P_2: Post photos and videos, make scheduled and expiring posts to Instagram and Pinterest.
LOGIN_MINOR: Login to see it in action.
RESET_P: Please write down your email. We will send you link to change password.
SIGNUP_P_1: Write your email. We will send you password to login.
RECOVER_PASSWORD_P_1: Please create new password and repeat it.
DASH_HOME_P: This is your home page. All your Instagram accounts will be displayed here.
DASH_INVITE_MANAGER_H: Below, enter the email address of the new manager
DASH_INVITE_MANAGER_P: We will create manager in your company and send him password to login.
DASH_ACCOUNTS_ACCOUNT_NOT_VERIFIED: Please wait until we verify this account
DASH_ACCOUNTS_ACCOUNT_REJECTED: We rejected verification of this account
DASH_ACCOUNTS_ACCOUNT_REJECTED_ADVICE: If you have any questions please feel free to contact us
START_UPLOADING: Are you ready? Start by uploading your first image or video
START_UPLOADING_STORY: Are you ready? Start by uploading your first story
START_UPLOADING_PINTEREST: Are you ready? Start by uploading your first image
ALL_UPLOADED_POSTS_WILL_BE_DISPLAYED_HER: All uploaded posts will be displayed here
DASH_PURCHASE_ONE_MONTH_TEXT: Pay monthly and get all the benefits
DASH_PURCHASE_THREE_MONTHS_TEXT: Save {{price}} USD and do not worry about purchasing for 3 months
DASH_PURCHASE_SIX_MONTHS_TEXT: Save {{price}} USD and do not worry about purchasing for half an year
DASH_ADD_ACCOUNT_H: First time adding this account to Postaddict.me?
DASH_ADD_ACCOUNT_P_1: The first time you add an account is when things commonly go wrong, and if it fails now, it will continue to fail.
DASH_ADD_ACCOUNT_P_2: Please make sure you have done the following. If you do not have all of the below, your posts will likely fail.
DASH_ADD_ACCOUNT_LI_1: (Important!) Make sure that you entered the correct account password. To do this, open a new tab in the browser with this address https://instagram.com and try to login
DASH_ADD_ACCOUNT_LI_2: Make sure that this Instagram account is attached to the email, facebook, phone number, and you have access to them.
DASH_ADD_ACCOUNT_LI_3: Account should not break Instagram rules.
DASH_ADD_ACCOUNT_LI_4: While we check your account it should be public.
DASH_ADD_ACCOUNT_P_3: When you submit this form, the account will not be activated on Postaddict.me yet. We need to review the account before we can check its login and make it live.
DASH_ACCOUNT_POST_MEDIA_OVER_LIMIT_ERROR: Caption's length should be less than 2000 symbols and hashtags should be less than 30.
DASH_ACCOUNT_POST_MEDIA_DATETIME_WARNING: Please choose correct date and time
DASH_ACCOUNT_POST_MEDIA_NOTIFICATION_FIR: Please note that when you post first time from our service, Instagram may ask you to confirm that it was you. In this case you should log into your account and confirm. After that it won't happen again.
DASH_ACCOUNT_SETTINGS_P_1_PASSWORD: To change the password of this Instagram account, first you should write below your password at Postaddict.me
DASH_ACCOUNT_SETTINGS_P_2_PASSWORD: Now write below new password for
PASSWORD_HINT_GUESSABLE: Little bit better but it is still guessable
THIS_TELEGRAM_USERNAME_IS_ALREADY_LINKED: This Telegram username is already linked to you
DASH_SUPPORT_ABOUT_COMPANY_P: We provide scheduled posting service to the Instagram
ARE_YOU_SURE_YOU_WANT_TO_DELETE_THIS_ACC: You are going to delete this account
ARE_YOU_SURE_YOU_WANT_TO_DELETE_THIS_MAN: You are going to delete this manager
ARE_YOU_SURE_YOU_WANT_TO_DELETE_THIS_POS: You are going to delete this post
You are going to delete this post from Instagram
POST_HAS_BEEN_SCHEDULED_TO_DELETE_FROM_I: Post has been scheduled to delete from Instagram
SUGGEST_CARD_P: Let your followers create content for you or just share interesting posts!
SUGGEST_START_DESCRIPTION_1: Suggest your interesting moments, photos or even videos to popular Instagram accounts.
SUGGEST_START_DESCRIPTION_2: Just upload your media and after write your comment.
YOU_CAN_NOT_SUGGEST_POST_TO_THIS_ACCOUNT: Unfortunately, you can not suggest post to this account
SUGGEST_ERROR_DESCRIPTION: Account has not been approved or this feature has not been enabled
YOU_HAVE_SUGGESTED_POST_TO: You have successfully suggested post to
SUGGEST_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: Your post will be reviewed by owner of this Instagram account and can be published.
GET_SOME_DISCOUNT_TEXT: We are so excited that you have chosen us and we would like to offer you these coupon that gives you 6 months of free of charge usage
NEWS_P_1: We have been developing our service for a long time. All this years we were trying to make the best platform for Instagram scheduled posts. Sure, there are some moments when we failed. But we always try to fix them and prevent in the future.
NEWS_P_2: Today we have decided to make something really good for all of you guys. Doing this we want to show how much we appreciate your support. We want to give everyone free gift.
NEWS_P_3: Now you won't see "Purchase" button in account cards. Instead there will be "Prolong for free". After clicking this button your account will be renewed for three months for free.
NEWS_P_4: Also please note that this gift is for all of your accounts. Any new users also will be able to use this, so yes, it means that if you are new to Postaddict then you will use this service for free for three months at least.
